citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:05 AM on April
25, 2023.
The inspector knocked on the door, yelled hello towards the animal facility, texted both contacts and called both contacts
leaving messages. The inspector left the facility at 11:40 AM.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:05 AM on April 
25, 2023. 
The inspector knocked on the door, yelled hello towards the animal facility, texted both contacts and called both contacts 
leaving messages.  The inspector left the facility at 11:40 AM. 
 
 
 
End Section
